sourcesContent:
Welcome to Sockets Io Chat Rooms

    {{room}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SocketService } from 'src/app/services/socket.service'; import { Room } from 'src/app/models/rooms'; import { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Observable, Subscription } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-rooms', templateUrl: './rooms.component.html', styleUrls: ['./rooms.component.css'] }) export class RoomsComponent { roomNames : string[] = []; roomName : string = ''; constructor( private socketService: SocketService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router, ) { } onCreateRoom(roomName : string) { this.socketService.joinRoom(roomName); // this.createDiv(roomName); this.roomName = ''; // this.router.navigate(['/room', roomName]); } ngOnInit(): void { this.socketService.teste(); this.socketService.fetchRooms(); // this.roomNames = this.socketService.roomNames; // this.socketService.onUpdateRooms().subscribe((data: any) => this.socketRooms = data); this.socketService.roomNames.subscribe( (data:any) => { this.roomNames = data; console.log(this.roomNames); } ); } }
